BR_text.BRsummary: encoding parameter to json.loads was deprecated and removed in Python 3.9
BR_text.BRdescription:
Ref : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/python/cpython/pull/18075>python/cpython#18075</denchmark-link>
 
 
 
 
 tfjs/tfjs-converter/python/tensorflowjs/converters/keras_h5_conversion_test.py
 
 
          Line 172
       in
       e063e10
 
 
 
 
 
 
  config_json = json.loads(model.to_json(), encoding='utf8')

comments_0.comment_text:
Tensorflow core supports until 3.8 , I believe this will be included once it is upgraded to 3.9 ,
 cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyu10055>@pyu10055</denchmark-link>
